heading: HR01838
0: A RESOLUTION CALLING FOR THE IMMEDIATE REVIEW OF THE IMPLEMENTATION OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10963, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE TAX REFORM FOR ACCELERATION AND INCLUSION (TRAIN) LAW, AND ITS IMPACT ON THE WAY OF LIFE OF FILIPINOS, SPECIFICALLY THE POOR, AMIDST THE CONTINUED INCREASE ON INFLATION, AND PRICES OF FUEL IN ORDER TO RECOMMEND FOR ITS CONTINUED IMPLEMENTATION OR SUSPENSION AS WELL AS TO COME UP WITH POLICIES THAT WOULD CUSHION ITS NEGATIVE IMPACT AGAINST THE POOR
status: Pending with the Committee on WAYS AND MEANS since 2018-05-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01838
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CALLING FOR THE IMMEDIATE REVIEW OF THE IMPLEMENTATION OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10963, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE TAX REFORM FOR ACCELERATION AND INCLUSION (TRAIN) LAW, AND ITS IMPACT ON THE WAY OF LIFE OF FILIPINOS, SPECIFICALLY THE POOR, AMIDST THE CONTINUED INCREASE ON INFLATION, AND PRICES OF FUEL IN ORDER TO RECOMMEND FOR ITS CONTINUED IMPLEMENTATION OR SUSPENSION AS WELL AS TO COME UP WITH POLICIES THAT WOULD CUSHION ITS NEGATIVE IMPACT AGAINST THE POOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-05-07
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS ON 2018-05-30
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2018-05-21;
